main.public_title: Effect of chimeric antigen receptor T cells on the B-cell acute lymphoblast leukemia with molecular relapse after allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation: A phase II, unblind, uncontrol clinical trial in a single center.

criteria.exclusion_criteria: 1. The uncontroled infection. HBV and HCV are positive; 2. The patients received any cell immunotherapy in the past.
